workflow.nodes.apply.form.access.label: DNS Provider Authorization
workflow.nodes.apply.form.access.placeho: Please select an authorization of DNS provider
workflow.nodes.apply.form.access.tooltip: Used to manage DNS records during ACME DNS-01 authentication.
workflow.nodes.apply.form.nameservers.pl: Please enter DNS recursive nameservers (separated by semicolons)
workflow.nodes.apply.form.nameservers.to: It determines whether to custom DNS recursive nameservers during ACME DNS-01 authentication. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default.
workflow.nodes.apply.form.propagation_ti: It determines the maximum waiting time for DNS propagation checks during ACME DNS-01 authentication. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default.
workflow.nodes.apply.form.disable_follow:
It determines whether to disable CNAME following during ACME DNS-01 authentication. If you don't understand this option, just keep it by default.
Learn more.
